reviews.text: I travel to Europe (mostly Switzerland and Austria) 3-4 times a year and this hotel is one of my top 5 favorites. I first discovered the hotel on the myswitzerland.com website. I could not find a review of the hotel on Tripadvisor so I was very nervous about staying at the Lenzerhorn. No need to be nervous about this hotel!!! Every phone conversation was friendly and helpful. Every email (and I sent quite a few!!) was answered promptly. Every special request was granted without hesitation.
reviews.title: One of My Favorite Hotels
